original_title: Morning Days 5 バスツアー in 日光 ~新垣里沙 亀井絵里 リンリン~
overview: Fanclub event DVD featuring Niigaki Risa, Kamei Eri and Lin Lin. It features their 2010 solo bus tour that ran from May 8th through 9th 2010 in Nikko. Disc 1 (89mins), Disc 2 (55mins).
title: Morning Days 5 Bus Tour in Nikko ~Niigaki Risa, Kamei Eri, Lin Lin~
